name: NeoRoboJack
description:
NeoRoboJack

If you are stuck, you can skip the level by pressing N. 

Press B if you want to go back to the previous level.

Press Q if you want to restart the current level , or you can press the restart button on the upper right corner of the game screen.

The controls are on the lower left corner of the game screen.

Thanks for playing! Don't forget to leave a rating for the Amaze Me Game Jam GMS2

Also... If you want to learn how to make the same Fast 2D Dynamic Lighting for you game on GMS2, you can check out my YouTube tutorial! (HTML Port + Edge Lighting coming soon)

Code, Graphics, Game Design, SFX, and Music made by Chico Perez (Grizzlius Maximus).

  • Gamemaker:Studio 2 (Game Engine)
  • Aseprite (Sprite Editor)
  • Waveform 11 (Music Editor)
  • BFXR (SFX Editor)
